analyzed: mngon par shes pa gsum dang bar chad med pa la sogs pa yon tan mngon par sgrub pa rnams dang gang dag bar chad med pa'i lam dang bsam gtan bzhi pa la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i bar chad med pa'i dang rnam par grol ba'i lam rnams dang
translated: Those who obtain unarisen contaminated access concentrations to the absorptions and formless states obtain them through the power of preparation and the power of cause.üîΩThose who obtain unarisen contaminated access concentrations to the absorptions and formless states

original: sa gong ma'i nyer bsdogs kyi sbyor ba'i lam dang / gzugs med pa gsum la 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / de dag la brten pa yon tan mngon par sgrub pa dang sbyor ba dang bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam ste /
analyzed: sa gong ma'i nyer bsdogs kyi sbyor ba'i lam dang / gzugs med pa gsum la 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / de dag la brten pa yon tan mngon par sgrub pa dang sbyor ba dang bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam ste /
translated: The path of preparation for the access concentration of higher level, freedom from attachment to the three formless realm states and the path of preparation, the uninterrupted path and the liberated path that manifest the qualities of those states.

original: de ltar lam snga ma de rnams thams cad la ni kun rdzob shes pa kho na 'thob kyi /
analyzed: de ltar lam snga ma de rnams thams cad la ni kun rdzob shes pa kho na 'thob kyi /
translated: Thus all of these former paths obtain conventional knowledge alone.

original: gzhan gyi sems shes pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan gyi sems shes pa ni ma yin te /
translated: They do not obtain knowledge of others' minds.

original: de ni nyer bsdogs dang bar chad med pa'i lam dang gzugs med pa rnams su bkag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni nyer bsdogs dang bar chad med pa'i lam dang gzugs med pa rnams su bkag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is because it is blocked in the access concentrations, the uninterrupted paths and the formless realm states.üîΩAgain, the Abhidharmakosa states,üîΩOn which path do they obtain which knowledge?

original: yang lam gang la zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i @315b lam mngon sum du gyur pa la'o //
analyzed: yang lam gang la zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i @315b lam mngon sum du gyur pa la'o //
translated: They obtain conventional knowledge on the mundane and transcendent paths.üîΩOn which level do they obtain which knowledge?

original: lam sa gang ba zhes bya ba ni mi lcogs pa med pa la sogs pa'i sa pa'o //
analyzed: lam sa gang ba zhes bya ba ni mi lcogs pa med pa la sogs pa'i sa pa'o //
translated: They obtain it on the level of unrestricted access concentration and so on.

original: dang po nyid du sa 'thob pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgo nas bsam gtan dang po la sogs pa 'thob ste /
analyzed: dang po nyid du sa 'thob pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgo nas bsam gtan dang po la sogs pa 'thob ste /
translated: First attaining the level is attaining the first absorption and so on through freedom from attachment.

original: sa de pa'i kun rdzob shes pa ma 'ongs pa 'thob po //
analyzed: sa de pa'i kun rdzob shes pa ma 'ongs pa 'thob po //
translated: One obtains future conventional knowledge of that level.

original: ji ltar zhe na /üîΩgal te mi lcogs pa med pa la brten te 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral nas bsam gtan dang po 'thob po //
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na / gal te mi lcogs pa med pa la brten te 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral nas bsam gtan dang po 'thob po //
translated: How is that?

original: bsdogs pa med pa'i sa pa dang / bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i kun rdzob shes pa 'thob po //üîΩde bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa'i nyer bsdogs la brten te dang por sa gang 'thob na /
analyzed: bsdogs pa med pa'i sa pa dang / bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i kun rdzob shes pa 'thob po // de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa'i nyer bsdogs la brten te dang por sa gang 'thob na /
translated: If one obtains the first absorption through the mundane path free from attachment to the desire realm in dependence on unrestricted access concentration, one obtains conventional knowledge of the level of unrestricted access concentration and the level of the first absorption.

original: kun rdzob shes pa bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa pa dang de'i nyer bsdogs kyi sa 'thob po //
analyzed: kun rdzob shes pa bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa pa dang de'i nyer bsdogs kyi sa 'thob po //
translated: Similarly, if one first obtains the level in dependence on access concentration to the second absorption, one obtains conventional knowledge of the level of the second absorption and the level of its access concentration.

original: srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du yang de dang 'dra ste /
analyzed: srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du yang de dang 'dra ste /
translated: This is similar up to the summit of existence.

original: de yang srid pa'i rtse mo'i sa pa dang de'i nyer bsdogs kyi sa pa 'thob po //
analyzed: de yang srid pa'i rtse mo'i sa pa dang de'i nyer bsdogs kyi sa pa 'thob po //
translated: One also obtains conventional knowledge of the level of the summit of existence and the level of its access concentration.

original: gang las chags bral bya phyir zhes bya ba ni sa gang las 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang las chags bral bya phyir zhes bya ba ni sa gang las 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: From which one is detached means from which level one is detached.

original: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
translated: The mundane and supramundane paths.

original: sbyor ba'i lam la sogs pa pa zhes bya ba ni rnam pa bzhi char yang ngo //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i lam la sogs pa pa zhes bya ba ni rnam pa bzhi char yang ngo //
translated: The path of preparation and so on means all four types.

original: de'i sa pa dang sa 'og ma'i zag pa med pa'i shes pa 'thob po //
analyzed: de'i sa pa dang sa 'og ma'i zag pa med pa'i shes pa 'thob po //
translated: One obtains the uncontaminated knowledge of that level and lower levels.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: dper na rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dper na rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: For example, in order to be detached from the base of infinite consciousness,

original: ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi nyer bsdogs kyis bsdus pa'i 'jig rten pa'i lam mngon du byed pa 'am /
analyzed: ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi nyer bsdogs kyis bsdus pa'i 'jig rten pa'i lam mngon du byed pa 'am /
translated: one manifests the mundane path subsumed by access concentration to the base of nothingness or

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyis zag pa med pa de nyid mngon sum du byed pas na /
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyis zag pa med pa de nyid mngon sum du byed pas na /
translated: one manifests the uncontaminated state of the base of infinite consciousness.

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi bdag nyid kyi sa gang las 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i don du lam du mngon du byed pa dang / de yang 'thob po /
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi bdag nyid kyi sa gang las 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i don du lam du mngon du byed pa dang / de yang 'thob po /
translated: The path of the base of infinite consciousness is manifested as the antidote to the level of infinite consciousness.üîΩAlso, the lower level is obtained.

original: 'og ma yang ji srid mi lcogs pa med pa'i sbyor ba dang bar chad med pa'i lam dang rnam par grol ba'i lam brgyad rnams su yang sa gong ma thams cad sa 'og ma rnams kyi gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'og ma yang ji srid mi lcogs pa med pa'i sbyor ba dang bar chad med pa'i lam dang rnam par grol ba'i lam brgyad rnams su yang sa gong ma thams cad sa 'og ma rnams kyi gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The level of infinite space is obtained on the eight uninterrupted and liberated paths of the level of unrestricted access concentration to the first absorption.

original: gang 'thob pa zhes bya ba ni gang gis thob pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'thob pa zhes bya ba ni gang gis thob pa'o //
translated: Obtained means obtained by that.

original: de'i sa pas ni sa 'og ma pa 'thob po //üîΩdper na rnam par grol ba'i @316a * //
analyzed: de'i sa pas ni sa 'og ma pa 'thob po // dper na rnam par grol ba'i @316a * //
translated: The lower level is obtained by the higher level.üîΩFor example, on the ninth liberated path, the base of nothingness is obtained and the level of unrestricted access concentration to the first absorption is obtained.

original: lam dgu ba la ci yang med kyi skye mched kyi sa 'thob pa dang de la brten pa'i sa thob pas der zag pa med pa'i shes pa 'thob pa dang / 'og ma mi lcogs pa med pa'i bar 'thob pa bzhin nam /
analyzed: lam dgu ba la ci yang med kyi skye mched kyi sa 'thob pa dang de la brten pa'i sa thob pas der zag pa med pa'i shes pa 'thob pa dang / 'og ma mi lcogs pa med pa'i bar 'thob pa bzhin nam /
translated: By obtaining that, uncontaminated knowledge is obtained and the lower level is obtained.

original: gang zhig 'dod pa'i khams las 'dod chags dang bral nas /
analyzed: gang zhig 'dod pa'i khams las 'dod chags dang bral nas /
translated: One who is free from attachment to the desire realm

original: bsam gtan dang po rnyed pa des bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa dang / mi lcogs pa med pas bsdus pa'i yon tan dag 'thob pa bzhin no //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po rnyed pa des bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa dang / mi lcogs pa med pas bsdus pa'i yon tan dag 'thob pa bzhin no //
translated: obtains the qualities subsumed by unrestricted access concentration and the first absorption.

original: de bzhin du srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar las 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur bas sa 'og ma'i yon tan zag pa med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar las 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur bas sa 'og ma'i yon tan zag pa med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Similarly, one who is free from attachment to the summit of existence obtains uncontaminated qualities of lower levels.

original: yang zhes bya ba'i dang pos ni de'i sa pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba'i dang pos ni de'i sa pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
translated: The first ‚Äúalso‚Äù indicates that one obtains not only those of its level.

original: 'o na ci zhe na gzhan gyis pa yang 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bstan la /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na gzhan gyis pa yang 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bstan la /
translated: What does one obtain? One also obtains those of other levels.

original: yang zhes bya ba'i sgra nyid pas kyang 'jig rten las 'das pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba'i sgra nyid pas kyang 'jig rten las 'das pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
translated: The second ‚Äúalso‚Äù indicates that one obtains not only transcendent qualities.

original: 'o na ci zhe na 'jig rten pa yang de zhes bstan to //
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na 'jig rten pa yang de zhes bstan to //
translated: What does one obtain? One also obtains mundane qualities.

original: gzhan dag ni don 'di nyid 'di ltar ma chad par byed de /
analyzed: gzhan dag ni don 'di nyid 'di ltar ma chad par byed de /
translated: Others explain the meaning of this passage as follows.

original: sa dang lam mngon du gyur pa ni gang /
analyzed: sa dang lam mngon du gyur pa ni gang /
translated: What is the actualization of the levels and the path?

original: sa'i shes pa thob pa du zhe na /
analyzed: sa'i shes pa thob pa du zhe na /
translated: How many conventional knowledges are obtained by one who obtains the knowledge of the faculties?

original: re zhig sa thams cad du rang gi sa pa'i lam mngon du byas pa ni rang gi sa pa kho na'i kun rdzob shes pa 'thob bo //
analyzed: re zhig sa thams cad du rang gi sa pa'i lam mngon du byas pa ni rang gi sa pa kho na'i kun rdzob shes pa 'thob bo //
translated: One who manifests the path of his own stage in all stages obtains only the conventional knowledge of his own stage.

original: zag pa med pa la ni khyad par 'di yin te /
analyzed: zag pa med pa la ni khyad par 'di yin te /
translated: But this is the difference with regard to the uncontaminated:

original: sa 'og ma pa rnams kyis ni ma 'ongs pa 'thob po //
analyzed: sa 'og ma pa rnams kyis ni ma 'ongs pa 'thob po //
translated: Those of lower stages obtain it in the future.

original: bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i zag pa med pa'i lam la sngar ma thob pa mngon du gyur pa ni ma 'ongs pa na bsten pa zag pa med pa'i sa pa'i shes pa 'thob po //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i zag pa med pa'i lam la sngar ma thob pa mngon du gyur pa ni ma 'ongs pa na bsten pa zag pa med pa'i sa pa'i shes pa 'thob po //
translated: When one manifests what was not previously obtained, the uncontaminated path of the first absorption, one obtains the uncontaminated knowledge of the future that is its basis.

original: de bzhin du ci yang med kyi skye mched kyi bar de srid du rim gyis de ltar brjod do //
analyzed: de bzhin du ci yang med kyi skye mched kyi bar de srid du rim gyis de ltar brjod do //
translated: In the same way, one should say this up to the base of nothingness.

original: mthong ba'i lam la dbang po 'pho ba la yang gang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir thob pa gang yin pa de 'og tu yang 'thob po //
analyzed: mthong ba'i lam la dbang po 'pho ba la yang gang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir thob pa gang yin pa de 'og tu yang 'thob po //
translated: Also, when upgrading one's intellectual faculty on the path of seeing, one obtains that which was previously obtained through freedom from attachment.

original: sa gang las 'dod chags dang bral ba las kyang lam gang yin pa de mngon du byas pa nas gong ma la yang 'thob po //
analyzed: sa gang las 'dod chags dang bral ba las kyang lam gang yin pa de mngon du byas pa nas gong ma la yang 'thob po //
translated: Also, one obtains the path that is free from attachment to any level, from the first level up to the summit of existence.

original: dper na ci yang med kyi skye mched kyi bar la 'dod chags dang bral ba srid pa'i rtse mo la 'dod chags dang bral ba dang mi lcogs pa med pas bsam gtan dang po mngon du byed pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na ci yang med kyi skye mched kyi bar la 'dod chags dang bral ba srid pa'i rtse mo la 'dod chags dang bral ba dang mi lcogs pa med pas bsam gtan dang po mngon du byed pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, one who is free from attachment to the base of nothingness up to the summit of existence manifests the first absorption through the unrestricted access concentration.

original: de sa dgu las zag pa med pa'i shes pa 'thob pa ni sa @316b la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgo nas 'thob po //
analyzed: de sa dgu las zag pa med pa'i shes pa 'thob pa ni sa @316b la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgo nas 'thob po //
translated: Obtaining uncontaminated knowledge of the nine levels is obtained through freedom from attachment to those levels.

original: de'i sa pa rnams kyang 'thob po /üîΩkun rdzob shes pa yang sa 'og ma pa'i lam mngon du gyur pa nas gang yin pa de'i dang po nas 'thob po //
analyzed: de'i sa pa rnams kyang 'thob po / kun rdzob shes pa yang sa 'og ma pa'i lam mngon du gyur pa nas gang yin pa de'i dang po nas 'thob po //
translated: One also obtains those of its level.üîΩConventional knowledge is obtained from the first moment of the path of the lower level.

original: de'i sa pa ma 'ongs pa 'thob po //
analyzed: de'i sa pa ma 'ongs pa 'thob po //
translated: One obtains future conventional knowledge of its level.

original: ji ltar bsam gtan dang po sa gnyis pa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba la rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa gnyis pa 'jig rten pa yang 'thob pa bzhin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: ji ltar bsam gtan dang po sa gnyis pa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba la rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa gnyis pa 'jig rten pa yang 'thob pa bzhin no zhes zer ro //
translated: One also obtains the conventional knowledge of the desire realm

original: zad pa shes la zag bcas kyang //
analyzed: zad pa shes la zag bcas kyang //
translated: when one obtains the knowledge of elimination.

original: zhes bya ba la dgra bcom pa nyid thob na yid kyi sa pa'i thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa las byung ba dang / mi sdug pa dang dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa dran pa la sogs pas thams cad pa dag 'thob po //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la dgra bcom pa nyid thob na yid kyi sa pa'i thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa las byung ba dang / mi sdug pa dang dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa dran pa la sogs pas thams cad pa dag 'thob po //
translated: When one obtains the state of an arhat, one obtains all conventional knowledge of the mental faculty that arises from hearing, contemplation, and meditation, and conventional knowledge of repulsiveness, mindfulness of inhalation and exhalation, and so on.

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: 'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa nas ji srid srid pa'i rtse mor skyes pa'i bar sa dgu po rnams so //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa nas ji srid srid pa'i rtse mor skyes pa'i bar sa dgu po rnams so //
translated: One is born in the desire realm up to the summit of existence.

original: de bzhin du sa gong ma mngon du gyur pa na sa 'og ma pa'i kun rdzob shes pa yang 'thob po zhes bya bar grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du sa gong ma mngon du gyur pa na sa 'og ma pa'i kun rdzob shes pa yang 'thob po zhes bya bar grub pa yin no //
translated: Similarly, when a higher level manifests, one also obtains conventional knowledge of a lower level.

original: sprog ma thag pa bcad de zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni dper na sprog ma thag pa gzhungs te /
analyzed: sprog ma thag pa bcad de zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni dper na sprog ma thag pa gzhungs te /
translated: The sutra states:üîΩJust as when a sack is cut open,

original: bcings pa thag pa bcad de dbugs phyin pa lta bu ste /üîΩde nyid du sprog ma dang chos mtshungs pa de lta bu bar chad med pa'i lam dgu pa rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis nyon mongs pa'i thob pa bcad pa las ji skad bshad pa'i yon tan mi sdug pa la sogs pa mi slob pa'i rgyud
analyzed: bcings pa thag pa bcad de dbugs phyin pa lta bu ste / de nyid du sprog ma dang chos mtshungs pa de lta bu bar chad med pa'i lam dgu pa rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis nyon mongs pa'i thob pa bcad pa las ji skad bshad pa'i yon tan mi sdug pa la sogs pa mi slob pa'i rgyud
translated: the wind escapes and it no longer moves,üîΩso too, when the vajra-like samadhiüîΩcuts the rope of afflicted views,üîΩthe wind of the mind escapesüîΩand the mind no longer moves.üîΩJust as when a sack is cut open, the wind escapes and it no longer moves,

original: la yod pa rnams thob pa'i sgo nas dbugs phyin pa lta bur 'gyur te /
analyzed: la yod pa rnams thob pa'i sgo nas dbugs phyin pa lta bur 'gyur te /
translated: so too, when the ninth uninterrupted path, the vajra-like samadhi, cuts the obtainment of affliction, it is like the wind escaping and it no longer moves, because the qualities explained, such as the state of nonlearner possessing repulsiveness and so on, are obtained in the mindstream.

original: cher sbyangs pa rnams kyi thob pa skye zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //üîΩrang gi sems la rgyal srid chen po nyid thob na zhes bya ba la lhag pa'i rgyal po'i rgyal srid chen po'o //
analyzed: cher sbyangs pa rnams kyi thob pa skye zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // rang gi sems la rgyal srid chen po nyid thob na zhes bya ba la lhag pa'i rgyal po'i rgyal srid chen po'o //
translated: This is the meaning of the statement, ‚ÄúThe obtainment of those who are greatly trained arises.‚ÄùüîΩWhen one‚Äôs mind obtains the state of a great king,üîΩit is the state of a supreme king.

original: de'i dngos po ni rgyal srid chen po nyid do //
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni rgyal srid chen po nyid do //
translated: The state of a great king is the state of a great king.

original: rang gi sems la rgyal srid chen po nyid thob par rang gi sems la rgyal srid chen po nyid thob pa ste rang gi sems la dbang thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi sems la rgyal srid chen po nyid thob par rang gi sems la rgyal srid chen po nyid thob pa ste rang gi sems la dbang thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because one‚Äôs mind has attained the state of a great king, since one‚Äôs mind has attained mastery.

original: dge ba'i chos mi sdug pa la sogs pa'i thob la 'bul ba dang 'dra ba rnams kyi bsu ba byed pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: dge ba'i chos mi sdug pa la sogs pa'i thob la 'bul ba dang 'dra ba rnams kyi bsu ba byed pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the wholesome roots, such as the meditation on the impurities, etc., are received by the mind, as if they were gifts.

original: dper na rgyal srid chen po thob na yul rnams kyis gos dang rgyan la sogs pa'i 'bul bas bsu ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na rgyal srid chen po thob na yul rnams kyis gos dang rgyan la sogs pa'i 'bul bas bsu ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, when one attains the state of a great king, the provinces receive him with gifts of clothing, ornaments, etc.

original: 'dir gnas kyis gnas pa bstan pa'o //üîΩde lta ma yin na khyad par @317a * //
analyzed: 'dir gnas kyis gnas pa bstan pa'o // de lta ma yin na khyad par @317a * //
translated: Here, the mind is the abode, and the wholesome roots are the abiders.

original: can gyis brjod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: can gyis brjod par bya ba yin no //
translated: Otherwise, the mind would be the object of expression, and the wholesome roots would be the means of expression.

original: gang gi rnyed pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gang gi rnyed pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: As for the phrase ‚Äúthe acquisition of which,‚Äù

original: bsam gtan la sogs pa mngon du byed pa de thams cad ma 'ongs pa 'thob bam zhe na /
analyzed: bsam gtan la sogs pa mngon du byed pa de thams cad ma 'ongs pa 'thob bam zhe na /
translated: does one acquire all future wholesome roots by manifesting the meditations, etc.?

original: de ni yod pa ma yin te sngon rnyed zin pa mi 'thob po //
analyzed: de ni yod pa ma yin te sngon rnyed zin pa mi 'thob po //
translated: No, one does not acquire those already acquired in the past.

original: gang zhig rnyed pa rnam par nyams pa las yang rnyed pa de yang mi 'thob po //
analyzed: gang zhig rnyed pa rnam par nyams pa las yang rnyed pa de yang mi 'thob po //
translated: One does not obtain that which one has obtained and then lost.

original: gang mngon par ma rnyed pa las rnyed pa de 'thob po //
analyzed: gang mngon par ma rnyed pa las rnyed pa de 'thob po //
translated: One obtains that which one has not obtained.

original: 'khor bar ma 'dris par zag pa med pa dang de dang mthun pa gang yin pa de ni mngon du gyur na de dang 'dra ba ma 'ongs pa khyad par can 'thob ste 'bad nas mngon du byed pa'i phyir ro //üîΩ'di ltar rnyed pa'i lam ni 'bad pas mngon du byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khor bar ma 'dris par zag pa med pa dang de dang mthun pa gang yin pa de ni mngon du gyur na de dang 'dra ba ma 'ongs pa khyad par can 'thob ste 'bad nas mngon du byed pa'i phyir ro // 'di ltar rnyed pa'i lam ni 'bad pas mngon du byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That which is not cultivated in cyclic existence, but is pure and conducive to that, when it becomes manifest, one obtains a special future state similar to it, because one manifests it through effort.

original: 'di ltar rnyed pa'i lam ni 'bad pas mngon du byed pas des 'phangs pa stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir 'ong ba 'thob kyi /
analyzed: 'di ltar rnyed pa'i lam ni 'bad pas mngon du byed pas des 'phangs pa stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir 'ong ba 'thob kyi /
translated: Because the path of acquisition is manifested through effort, one obtains the future state projected by that, because it is powerful.

original: sngon rnyed pa ni 'bad pa med par mngon du 'gyur te /
analyzed: sngon rnyed pa ni 'bad pa med par mngon du 'gyur te /
translated: But that which was previously obtained is manifested without effort.

original: de bsgom zhing rnyed pa'i phyir dang / tshar cig dga' ba med pa'i phyir dang / shin tu mngon du 'gyur ba'i phyir ma 'ongs pa mi 'thob po //
analyzed: de bsgom zhing rnyed pa'i phyir dang / tshar cig dga' ba med pa'i phyir dang / shin tu mngon du 'gyur ba'i phyir ma 'ongs pa mi 'thob po //
translated: Because it is cultivated and obtained, because there is no joy in a single moment, and because it is fully manifested, one does not obtain a future state.

original: 'thob pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste grangs bstan pa ni nges par gzung bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'thob pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste grangs bstan pa ni nges par gzung bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Attainment is of four types. The teaching of the number is for the purpose of determining the number.

original: rnyed pa'i thob pa zhes bya ba ni yon tan gang yang rung ba goms pas yon tan gang yang rung ba 'thob po //
analyzed: rnyed pa'i thob pa zhes bya ba ni yon tan gang yang rung ba goms pas yon tan gang yang rung ba 'thob po //
translated: The attainment of acquisition is the attainment of any quality through the cultivation of any quality.

original: rnyed pa nyid 'thob pa yin pas na rnyed pa'i 'thob pa'o //
analyzed: rnyed pa nyid 'thob pa yin pas na rnyed pa'i 'thob pa'o //
translated: Since it is the acquisition of acquisition, it is the attainment of acquisition.

original: bsten pa'i thob pa zhes bya ba la bsten pa ni chos thob zin pa mngon du byed pa'o //
analyzed: bsten pa'i thob pa zhes bya ba la bsten pa ni chos thob zin pa mngon du byed pa'o //
translated: The attainment of practice is the actualization of a quality that has already been obtained.

original: bsten pa nyid 'thob pa yin pas na bsten pa'i thob pa'o //
analyzed: bsten pa nyid 'thob pa yin pas na bsten pa'i thob pa'o //
translated: Since it is the acquisition of practice, it is the attainment of practice.

original: gnyen po'i 'thob pa zhes bya ba la gnyen po ni lam ste /
analyzed: gnyen po'i 'thob pa zhes bya ba la gnyen po ni lam ste /
translated: The attainment of antidote is the path.

original: gnyen po nyid 'thob pa yin pas na gnyen po'i thob pa'o //
analyzed: gnyen po nyid 'thob pa yin pas na gnyen po'i thob pa'o //
translated: Since it is the acquisition of the antidote, it is the attainment of the antidote.

original: de ni lus la sogs pa rnams kyis lus la sogs pa'i gnyen po rtogs pa las lus bsgom pa zhes bya ba lta bu ste /
analyzed: de ni lus la sogs pa rnams kyis lus la sogs pa'i gnyen po rtogs pa las lus bsgom pa zhes bya ba lta bu ste /
translated: It is like the statement, ‚ÄúOne cultivates the body by means of the body,‚Äù where the body is the antidote to the body.

original: de bzhin du zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gzhan dag kyang yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gzhan dag kyang yin no //
translated: It is the same for other contaminated phenomena.

original: kha cig na re lus kyi gnyen po ni bsam gtan bzhi pa las 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa'i lam gang yin pa'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: kha cig na re lus kyi gnyen po ni bsam gtan bzhi pa las 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa'i lam gang yin pa'o zhes zer ro //
translated: Some say: The antidote to the body is the path that frees one from attachment to the fourth absorption.

original: gzhan dag na re gzugs kyi 'dod chags zad par byed pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: gzhan dag na re gzugs kyi 'dod chags zad par byed pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: Others say: It is the uninterrupted path that exhausts attachment to the form realm.

original: de bzhin du gzhan la yang brjod par bya'o //üîΩthag bsring ba'i zhes bya bas thag bsring @317b ba'i 'thob pa de yang nyon mongs pa'i thob pa bcad pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan la yang brjod par bya'o // thag bsring ba'i zhes bya bas thag bsring @317b ba'i 'thob pa de yang nyon mongs pa'i thob pa bcad pa'o //
translated: The same should be said for the others.üîΩThe obtainment of distancing is the cutting of the obtainment of affliction.

original: nyon mongs pa'i 'thob pa bcad pa las thob pa skye bar mthong ba yin no //üîΩlus la sogs pa rnams kho na de la dmigs pa'i nyon mongs pa spong ba'i thabs su rnyed pa ni thag bsring ba'i 'thob pa'o zhes kha cig zer ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i 'thob pa bcad pa las thob pa skye bar mthong ba yin no // lus la sogs pa rnams kho na de la dmigs pa'i nyon mongs pa spong ba'i thabs su rnyed pa ni thag bsring ba'i 'thob pa'o zhes kha cig zer ro //
translated: The obtainment of distancing is seen to arise from the cutting of the obtainment of affliction.üîΩSome say: The obtainment of distancing is the means of abandoning the affliction that focuses on the body and so on.

original: lus la dmigs pa'i nyon mongs pa spangs pa las thag bsring ba'i 'thob pa ste lus bsgom pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: lus la dmigs pa'i nyon mongs pa spangs pa las thag bsring ba'i 'thob pa ste lus bsgom pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The obtainment of distancing from the abandonment of affliction focusing on the body is called meditation on the body.

original: de bzhin du gzhan yang zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams la brtan pa 'thob pa gcig pu bstan pa nyid kyis gnyen po dang thag bsring ba thob pa yang mtshon te /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan yang zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams la brtan pa 'thob pa gcig pu bstan pa nyid kyis gnyen po dang thag bsring ba thob pa yang mtshon te /
translated: So too, the obtainment of antidotes and the obtainment of distance are also indicated by the mere statement that one obtains stability in contaminated phenomena.

original: de'i rnam grangs nyid kyis de bshad do //
analyzed: de'i rnam grangs nyid kyis de bshad do //
translated: They are explained by that very enumeration.üîΩThose of future states are one,üîΩthat is, the obtainment of acquisition.

original: ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi ni gcig go zhes bya ba ni rnyed pa'i 'thob pa'o //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi ni gcig go zhes bya ba ni rnyed pa'i 'thob pa'o //
translated: Those of present states are both,üîΩthat is, the obtainment of stability.üîΩThus, those of past and future states are one,

analyzed: de ltar byung ba rnams kyi ni gnyi ga'o zhes bya ba ni brtan pa 'thob pa'o //
translated: that is, the obtainment of acquisition.üîΩThose of present states are both,üîΩthat is, the obtainment of stability.üîΩThus, those of past and future states are one,

original: de ltar na zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /

original: gang gi phyir rnyed pa dang brtan pa thob pa ni bye brag med par bshad pa'i phyir dge ba 'dus byas zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa rnams kyi yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rnyed pa dang brtan pa thob pa ni bye brag med par bshad pa'i phyir dge ba 'dus byas zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa rnams kyi yin no //
translated: that is, the obtainment of acquisition.üîΩThose

analyzed: gnyen po dang thag bsring ba 'thob pa dag ni bye brag med par bshad pa'i phyir zag pa dang bcas pa nyon mongs pa can dang / nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa rnams kyi yin pa de'i phyir de ltar na dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa rnams kyi 'thob pa bzhi yin te /

analyzed: dge ba 'dus byas yin pa'i phyir dang po nyid yin la /
translated: Because virtuous states are conditioned, they are the first.

analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa'i phyir phyi ma gnyis yin no //
translated: Because they are contaminated, they are the latter two.

analyzed: gal te lam 'bras bu dang bcas par bzung ba ni zhes bya ba la /
translated: If one takes the path together with its result,

original: lam gyi 'bras bu ni 'gog pa ste bral ba'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lam gyi 'bras bu ni 'gog pa ste bral ba'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the result of the path is cessation, because it is the result of separation.

original: gnyis ni kun rdzob shes pa yin zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin no //
analyzed: gnyis ni kun rdzob shes pa yin zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin no //
translated: Two are conventional knowledge.

original: de dag gi mtshan nyid ni bdag dang gzhan dag gi skye ba 'das pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dran pa la thogs pa med pa'i mkhyen pa ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so //
analyzed: de dag gi mtshan nyid ni bdag dang gzhan dag gi skye ba 'das pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dran pa la thogs pa med pa'i mkhyen pa ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so //
translated: The power of knowledge of recollecting former abodes or existences is the unobstructed knowledge of recollecting the succession of one's own and others' births in past existences.üîΩThe power of knowledge of death and rebirth is the unobstructed knowledge of sentient beings' death in one place and rebirth in another.

original: sems can rnams kyi ma 'ongs pa'i srid par nying mtshams sbyor ba la thogs pa med pa ni shi 'pho ba dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs so //üîΩzad pa drug gam bcu yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi ma 'ongs pa'i srid par nying mtshams sbyor ba la thogs pa med pa ni shi 'pho ba dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs so // zad pa drug gam bcu yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: The power of knowledge of the termination of contamination is the knowledge of the termination of contamination.

original: gal te zag pa zad pa'i mkhyen pa'i stobs zag pa zad pa'i yul can nyid yin no //
analyzed: gal te zag pa zad pa'i mkhyen pa'i stobs zag pa zad pa'i yul can nyid yin no //
translated: If the power of knowledge of the termination of contamination is the knowledge of the termination of contamination itself,

original: de ltar na shes pa drug gi bdag nyid de gzhan gyi sems dang sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang / lam shes pa dag ma gtogs so //
analyzed: de ltar na shes pa drug gi bdag nyid de gzhan gyi sems dang sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang / lam shes pa dag ma gtogs so //
translated: then it is the nature of six knowledges, excluding the knowledge of others' minds, the knowledge of suffering, the knowledge of origin, and the knowledge of the path.

original: 'on te zag pa zad pa thabs dang bcas pa gzung na ni de lta na shes pa bcu ste /
analyzed: 'on te zag pa zad pa thabs dang bcas pa gzung na ni de lta na shes pa bcu ste /
translated: But if the termination of contamination is taken to include the method, then it is the nature of ten knowledges, excluding the knowledge of nonarising.

original: de skad du yang zag pa zad pa dang / de'i thabs la thogs pa med pa'i mkhyen pa ni stobs zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de skad du yang zag pa zad pa dang / de'i thabs la thogs pa med pa'i mkhyen pa ni stobs zhes bshad do //
translated: Thus, the knowledge that is unobstructed with regard to the destruction of the defilements and the means for that is called a power.

original: 'dir stobs phyi ma gsum po 'di rnams ni phul ba dang bcas pa'i rig pa gsum mo //
analyzed: 'dir stobs phyi ma gsum po 'di rnams ni phul ba dang bcas pa'i rig pa gsum mo //
translated: Here, the last three powers are the three knowledges that are preeminent.

original: rdzu 'phrul dang lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rgyud la phul du 'byung ba dang bcas pa dag tu yang mi gzung ste /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul dang lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rgyud la phul du 'byung ba dang bcas pa dag tu yang mi gzung ste /
translated: The superknowledges of supernatural power and divine ear are not considered preeminent in the mind of the Tathagata,

original: ha cang don che ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ha cang don che ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are not very useful.

original: lha'i mig gis mtho ris kyi thabs dang rnam par smin pa mthong ste /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mtho ris kyi thabs dang rnam par smin pa mthong ste /
translated: The divine eye sees the means and the maturation of rebirth in the higher realms.

original: de dang 'brel pa dang de'i las kyang shes pa don che ba'i phyir 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs so //
analyzed: de dang 'brel pa dang de'i las kyang shes pa don che ba'i phyir 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs so //
translated: The knowledge of the connection with that and the karma for that is useful, and so it is the power of knowledge of death and rebirth.

original: de dang 'dra bar 'dir rna ba la ma bshad pa nyid do //
analyzed: de dang 'dra bar 'dir rna ba la ma bshad pa nyid do //
translated: The divine ear is not explained in the same way here.

original: gzhan gyi sems shes pa'i stobs kyang tha dad par bshad pa dang bshad pa'i rang bzhin nyid las dbang po dang mos pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dag kho na de'i 'khor bshad do //
analyzed: gzhan gyi sems shes pa'i stobs kyang tha dad par bshad pa dang bshad pa'i rang bzhin nyid las dbang po dang mos pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dag kho na de'i 'khor bshad do //
translated: The power of knowledge of others' minds is also explained as distinct, but the explanation of its retinue is only the powers of knowledge of faculties and knowledge of dispositions, because it is of the nature of those two.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa ni bzo dang bstan bcos thams cad mkhyen pa mnga' dbang brnyes pa yin pas phrin las @321b grub pa yin la /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa ni bzo dang bstan bcos thams cad mkhyen pa mnga' dbang brnyes pa yin pas phrin las @321b grub pa yin la /
translated: Omniscience is the power of knowledge of all arts and sciences, and it is the power of knowledge of all activities.

original: khyad par shes bya rnam pa bcu so sor mkhyen cing rtogs pas ni sangs rgyas nyid do //
analyzed: khyad par shes bya rnam pa bcu so sor mkhyen cing rtogs pas ni sangs rgyas nyid do //
translated: In particular, buddhahood is the knowledge and realization of the ten aspects of objects of knowledge.

original: chos rnams kyi rgyu dang rgyu ma yin pa nges par gyur pas shes bya rnam pa bcu yang mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa pa'i las sna tshogs dang mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa pa'i rnam pa'i dbye pa dang / gdul bya'i skye bo rnams kyi dbang po dang mos pa dang khams sna tshogs dang ngan 'gro rnam pa gsum gyi rgyu dang gnyen po dang sngon gyi mtha' dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang mtshams sbyor ba rnams so //
analyzed: chos rnams kyi rgyu dang rgyu ma yin pa nges par gyur pas shes bya rnam pa bcu yang mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa pa'i las sna tshogs dang mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa pa'i rnam pa'i dbye pa dang / gdul bya'i skye bo rnams kyi dbang po dang mos pa dang khams sna tshogs dang ngan 'gro rnam pa gsum gyi rgyu dang gnyen po dang sngon gyi mtha' dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang mtshams sbyor ba rnams so //
translated: The ten objects of knowledge are the various actions of the stage of non-concentration, the various categories of the stage of concentration, the various faculties, inclinations, and dispositions of the disciples, and the causes and antidotes of the three unfortunate states of existence.

original: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes pa bcus gdul bya rnams la yongs su gzigs pa nye bar 'jug go //
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes pa bcus gdul bya rnams la yongs su gzigs pa nye bar 'jug go //
translated: Thus, the Tathagatas, by means of these ten knowledges, engage in the observation of the disciples.

original: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa ni gdul bya skal ba dang ldan pa dang skal ba dang ldan pa ma yin pa rnams yongs su gzigs so //
analyzed: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa ni gdul bya skal ba dang ldan pa dang skal ba dang ldan pa ma yin pa rnams yongs su gzigs so //
translated: The knowledge of what is possible and impossible is the observation of the disciples who are fortunate or unfortunate.

original: las bdag gir bya ba mkhyen pa las kyi sgrib pa rnams so //
analyzed: las bdag gir bya ba mkhyen pa las kyi sgrib pa rnams so //
translated: The knowledge of the results of the deeds of all kinds is the observation of the disciples who are to be converted.üîΩThe knowledge of the paths that lead everywhere is the observation of the disciples who are to be converted by the vehicle of the disciples, etc.üîΩThe knowledge of the absorptions, etc., is the observation of the disciples who are to be converted by the absorptions, etc.üîΩThe knowledge of the various elements is the observation of the disciples who are to be converted by the various elements.üîΩThe knowledge of recollecting former abodes is the observation of the disciples who are to be converted by the recollection of former abodes.üîΩThe knowledge of death and rebirth is the observation of the disciples who are to be converted by the knowledge of death and rebirth.üîΩThe knowledge of the extinction of the impurities is the observation of the disciples who are to be converted by the extinction of the impurities.

original: bsam gtan la sogs pa mkhyen pas ro myong ba dang ro myong ba ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: bsam gtan la sogs pa mkhyen pas ro myong ba dang ro myong ba ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: He knows the absorptions, etc., and thus he knows their taste and non-taste.

original: de yang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa nyid bstan pa las de'i stobs las rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa nyid do //
analyzed: de yang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa nyid bstan pa las de'i stobs las rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa nyid do //
translated: And since he has taught the obscurations of the passions, he knows the obscurations of retribution through their power.

analyzed: dbang po mkhyen pas ni rnam par byang ba'i nus pa mkhyen no //

original: mos pa mkhyen pa ni sbyor ba dang gang gis sbyor ba'i khyad par mkhyen no //üîΩkhams mkhyen pas ni bsam pa dang kun tu 'gro ba mkhyen pas ni phan pa dang mi phan pa la rab tu 'jug pa dang ldog pa yang dag par rig go //üîΩsngon gyi gnas mkhyen pas ni kun tu 'gro ba mkhyen no //üîΩlha'i mig gis ni nying mtshams sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: mos pa mkhyen pa ni sbyor ba dang gang gis sbyor ba'i khyad par mkhyen no // khams mkhyen pas ni bsam pa dang kun tu 'gro ba mkhyen pas ni phan pa dang mi phan pa la rab tu 'jug pa dang ldog pa yang dag par rig go // sngon gyi gnas mkhyen pas ni kun tu 'gro ba mkhyen no // lha'i mig gis ni nying mtshams sbyor ba'o //
translated: Through his knowledge of resolves he knows the distinctions of application and by what means there is application.

original: zag pa zad pa mkhyen pas ni rnam par grol ba'o //
analyzed: zag pa zad pa mkhyen pas ni rnam par grol ba'o //
translated: Through his knowledge of the elements he knows the intentions. Through his knowledge of the paths he knows the means of purification. Through his knowledge of the superior and inferior faculties of others he knows the superiority and inferiority of the means of purification. Through his knowledge of thorough understanding he knows the means of purification that is applied. Through his knowledge of the various and single resolves of beings he knows the means of purification that is applied to the various and single vehicles. Through his knowledge of the world he knows the means of purification that is applied to the benefit and happiness of all beings. Through his knowledge of the result of the former births of beings he knows the means of purification that is applied to the various destinies of beings. Through his knowledge of death and rebirth he knows the means of purification that is applied to the various families of beings. Through his knowledge of the extinction of the outflows he knows the means of purification that is applied to the extinction of the outflows.

original: de ltar 'di dag gang yang rung ba ma tshang na ston pa'i las mtha' dag sgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: de ltar 'di dag gang yang rung ba ma tshang na ston pa'i las mtha' dag sgrub par mi nus so //
translated: If any of these are incomplete, one is unable to accomplish all the deeds of a teacher.

analyzed: sngon gnas 'chi 'pho skye ba'i chos //
translated: The knowledge of former abodes, of death and rebirth, and of the exhaustion of contaminationüîΩare the three knowledges.

translated: ‚ÄúI do not see any reason why any ascetic, brahmin, god, Mara, Brahma, or anyone else in the world could legitimately challenge me, saying, ‚ÄòYou have not realized this or that aspect of the Dharma.‚Äô
